NAME: Resource Associator
Description: KORA identifier for the Resource record that this Pages record is part of.ÃŠ This Pages record contains a digital file and technical metadata for 1 scanned page of the referenced Resource.

NAME: Resource Identifier
Description: This Pages record contains a digital file and technical metadata for 1 scanned page of the referenced Resource.

NAME: Format
Description: Digital or electronic format of the access or distribution file of the resource.

NAME: Type
Description: Broad term describing the nature or genre of digital file

NAME: Page Identifier
Description: Unique numeric or alphanumeric identification; Alpha/numeric character string of file name including file extension.

NAME: Scan Number
Description: Number indicating the scan sequence for a resource

NAME: Image Upload
Description: Upload jpeg file of scanned Archival Object.

NAME: Scan Specifications
Description: Description of the dimensions, resolution, type of digitization and any other information pertinent to the creation of the electronic file.

NAME: Scan Equipment
Description: Name or other unique identifier of the device used to create an electronic file.

NAME: Scan Date
Description: Production date of the electronic file, expressed in yyyy/mm/dd format

NAME: Scan Creator
Description: Name or other unique identification of a known person responsible for the creation of the electronic file.

NAME: Scan Creator Status
Description: Information concerning whether the identification of a known person may appear in a publicly accessible format.

NAME: Rights
Description: Information about rights management; may include copyright and other intellectual property statements required for use regarding the resource and/or its associated electronic file.
